page: MT60004: Principles And Techniques Of Materials

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Optical Metallography techniques like polarized light microscopy, DIC, fluorescence, etc.; Diffraction Methods like texture measurement, residual stress analysis, EXAFS, neutron diffraction, etc.; Electron Optical and related techniques like TEM, SEM, EDS, WDS/EPMA, CBED, HREM, EELS, etc.; Surface Analysis and related techniques like Auger, XPS, SIMS, RBS, STM, AFM, etc.; Thermal Analysis like DTA, DSC, TGA, TMA, etc.; Spectroscopy Techniques like optical emission spectroscopy, atomic absorption spectrometry, x-ray spectrometry, infrared spectroscopy, Raman spectroscopy, electron spin resonance, nuclear magnetic resonance, Mossbauer spectroscopy, etc.; Electrical Resistivity measurement
page: MT60004: Principles And Techniques Of Materials
